DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss and/or Exercise Training Discover Muscle Lipids Related Insulin Sensitivity
DOC.criteria: Obese men woman prediabetes recruit study age range 3060 year old . Individuals impair fast glucose ( IFG ) , impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) , combination two ( IFG/IGT ) recruit verified use oral glucose tolerance test initial screening . All subject obese ( BMI 3040 kg/m2 ) sedentary ( < 2 hours/week plan physical activity ) . Impaired fast glucose define fast glucose 100125mg/dl , postprandial glucose ( < 140 mg/dl 2 hr 75g OGTT ) . Impaired glucose tolerance define normal fast glucose < 100mg/dl , postprandial glucose ( > 140 mg/dl 2 hr 75g OGTT ) . Subjects IFG/IGT impair fast glucose ( 100125mg/dl ) , impair glucose tolerance ( > 140 mg/dl 2 hr 75g OGTT ) ( 49 ) . To increase generalizability , subject serf control , woman enrol regardless menopausal status , use hormone replacement therapy oral contraceptive . Regular exercise 2 hours/week , medication could affect glucose , lipid metabolism , thyroid disease , history lung disease , pregnancy , active cigarette smoking exposure second hand smoke severe plasma lipid disorder .
